Blog

:root{--spacer-sm:.5rem;--spacer-md:1rem;--spacer-lg:2rem;--text:#000;--font:sans-serif;--brand:#228b22;font-size:16px}*{box-sizing:border-box;font-family:var(--font);word-break:break-word}*>*{border-radius:1em;margin:var(--spacer-sm);padding:var(--spacer-sm)}*{color:var(--text);font-size:1rem}h1{font-size:2rem}h2{font-size:1.5rem}h3{font-size:1.25rem}h4{font-size:1.13rem}h5{font-size:1.07rem}h6{font-size:1.035rem}code{display:inline-block;font-family:monospace}pre{border:none;display:flex}pre>code{border-radius:0;box-shadow:var(--spacer-sm) var(--spacer-sm) 0 0 var(--brand);flex:1;margin:0 0 var(--spacer-lg) 0}pre>code:before{content:"```";display:block;margin-bottom:var(--spacer-sm)}pre>code:after{content:"```";display:block;margin-top:var(--spacer-sm)}pre>:is(code,code:before,code:after){background:#eee;border:none;color:#141414}p>code{margin:0 var(--spacer-sm);padding:0 var(--spacer-sm)}a{border:none;color:var(--brand);margin:0;padding:0;text-decoration:underline}blockquote{background:#eee;border:none;border-left:var(--spacer-sm) solid var(--brand)}blockquote p{border:none;font-family:Serif}body{margin:0 auto;max-width:960px}img{margin:var(--spacer-sm) 0;padding:var(--spacer-sm) 0}.inline-list,.inline-list p:first-of-type{display:inline-block}.inline-list p:first-of-type:after{content:"";display:inline-block;width:1ch}.inline-list :is(ul,ol){display:inline-flex;flex-wrap:wrap;list-style:none;padding:0}.inline-list :is(ul,ol)>li:not(:last-of-type){margin-right:1ch}.inline-list :is(ul,ol)>li:not(:last-of-type):after{content:", "}
